body:
Comment 1: 
http://golang.org/ref/spec#Handling_panics

"The return value of recover is nil if [...] recover was not called directly by a
deferred function.".

In your example, the recover in b() is meant to protect against panics in a(), but not
against panics in main(). The spec could be a bit more explicit but this is working as
intended.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
